item.title: Water leaking up into road south of where another leak was fixed, 12th June
item.description:
Water coming up through road eroding surface. I believe Thames Water attended on a rainy day and dismissed the link. The road is soaking wet, clearly a leak and surface starting to break up
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 147, High Road, New Southgate, London

item.title: Hazelmere Rd - pedestrian area between Priory Park Rd and Glengall Rd, 12th June
item.description:
Dumped sofa and rough sleeping. This dumped sofa has been reported a number of times - including with a note of which property dumped it - and so has the rough sleeping. Word has obviously traveled and we have 3 rough sleepers here this morning. Brent Council - please take notice and action these concerns

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Priory Park Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
What is happening here????!!!! This is a brand new sofa that has been dumped from yesterdayâ€™s sofa and now we have 2 rough sleepers on it! The place looks like a crack alley. Please, you really need to do something about this area.

item.title: Palestinian Flag being flown out of window, 12th June
item.description:
Churchwell Court - A flat is flying the Palestinian flag out of their window. This is an eyesore in a conservation area and I do not want to see this flag every time I walk past (I live on the square). This is offensive to people.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Square, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
